description: RIA-2297 Send listing notification to Admin Officer when case edited and hearing adjustments updated

notifications.subject: Immigration and Asylum appeal: change to Hearing requirements
body: The hearing requirements for this appeal have changed.
Review the Hearing requirements in the Hearing tab. You can also refer to the Applications tab if you need help to identify what changes the Tribunal Caseworker has agreed.
You should then update the requirements in Aria and relist if necessary. Once you've done this, you should relist the case or confirm the original listing in the online service.
